text: A Quiet Place in the Country (, ) is a 1968 French Italian thriller movie directed by Elio Petri and based on the short story The Beckoning Fair One by Oliver Onions. It stars Vanessa Redgrave, Franco Nero, Georges GÃ©ret, Gabriella Boccardo and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 thriller movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Italian thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Elio Petri Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies set in country houses
